entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 15. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 14. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
